sqlMap.select: /* searchDAO.programSearchList */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , ALL_LIST.* FROM (SELECT A.PRG_SN AS id , A.PRG_SN , A.PRG_SE , A.PRG_CL , A.PRG_SE_NM , A.PRG_CL_NM , A.PRG_NM , A.PRG_CN , A.BEGIN_DT , A.END_DT , CASE WHEN A.PROGRS_STTUS = 'P' AND A.REQST_MTHD = '01' AND A.WAIT_REQST_AT = 'Y' AND TOT_CNT01 < A.WAIT_REQST_NMPR THEN 'P' WHEN A.PROGRS_STTUS = 'P' AND A.REQST_MTHD = '01' AND A.WAIT_REQST_AT = 'Y' AND TOT_CNT01 >= A.WAIT_REQST_NMPR THEN 'F' WHEN A.PROGRS_STTUS = 'P' AND A.REQST_MTHD = '01' AND A.WAIT_REQST_AT != 'Y' AND TOT_CNT02 >= A.PSNCPA THEN 'F' ELSE A.PROGRS_STTUS END AS PROGRS_STTUS , A.REQST_MTHD , A.REQST_MTHD_NM , A.PSNCPA , '/'|| A.SITE_SE ||'/progrm/master/view.do?prgSn='|| A.PRG_SN ||'&prgSe='|| A.PRG_SE ||'&prgCl='|| A.PRG_CL ||'&menuNo=' || A.MENU_NO AS FULL_MENU_LINK , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.SITE_SE FROM (SELECT T.PRG_SN , PRG_SE , PRG_CL , FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM050', PRG_SE) AS PRG_SE_NM , FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM050', PRG_CL) AS PRG_CL_NM , PRG_NM , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(PRG_CN, 2000, 1) AS PRG_CN , TO_CHAR(REQST_BEGIN_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as BEGIN_DT , CASE WHEN RCRIT_COMPT_AT = 'Y' THEN '모집완료시' ELSE TO_CHAR(REQST_END_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') END AS END_DT , CASE WHEN SYSTIMESTAMP < REQST_BEGIN_DT THEN 'W' WHEN SYSTIMESTAMP > REQST_BEGIN_DT AND SYSTIMESTAMP < REQST_END_DT THEN 'P' WHEN SYSTIMESTAMP > REQST_END_DT THEN 'F' END AS PROGRS_STTUS , RCRIT_COMPT_AT , REQST_MTHD , FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM053', REQST_MTHD) AS REQST_MTHD_NM , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , PSNCPA , TOT_CNT01 , TOT_CNT02 , WAIT_REQST_AT , WAIT_REQST_NMPR , CASE WHEN PRG_CL = '10' THEN '500022' WHEN PRG_CL = '11' THEN '500023' WHEN PRG_CL = '12' THEN '500024' WHEN PRG_CL = '13' THEN '500025' WHEN PRG_CL = '20' THEN '500048' WHEN PRG_CL = '21' THEN '500049' WHEN PRG_CL = '30' THEN '200025' WHEN PRG_CL = '31' THEN '200026' WHEN PRG_CL = '40' THEN '200029' WHEN PRG_CL = '41' THEN '200030' WHEN PRG_CL = '42' THEN '200031' END AS MENU_NO , SITE_SE FROM TN_PROGRAM T LEFT OUTER JOIN ( /*대기신청 인원*/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT01, PRG_SN FROM TN_REQUEST_INDVDLINFO WHERE DELETE_AT = '0' AND RCEPT_STTUS = '01' GROUP BY PRG_SN )T1 ON T.PRG_SN = T1.PRG_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN ( /*신청완료 인원*/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT02, PRG_SN FROM TN_REQUEST_INDVDLINFO WHERE DELETE_AT = '0' AND RCEPT_STTUS = '02' GROUP BY PRG_SN)T2 ON T.PRG_SN = T2.PRG_SN WHERE DELETE_AT = '0' AND USE_AT = 'Y' ) A WHERE A.PRG_NM LIKE '%' || #q# || '%' ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > NVL(#firstPage#, 0) * 10 AND RNUM <= (NVL(#firstPage#, 0) * 10) + #recordCountPage#

/* searchDAO.programSearchListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT T.PRG_SN , PRG_SE , PRG_CL , FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM050', PRG_SE) AS PRG_SE_NM , FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM050', PRG_CL) AS PRG_CL_NM , PRG_NM , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(PRG_CN, 2000, 1) AS PRG_CN , TO_CHAR(REQST_BEGIN_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as BEGIN_DT , CASE WHEN RCRIT_COMPT_AT = 'Y' THEN '모집완료시' ELSE TO_CHAR(REQST_END_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') END AS END_DT , CASE WHEN SYSTIMESTAMP < REQST_BEGIN_DT THEN 'W' WHEN SYSTIMESTAMP > REQST_BEGIN_DT AND SYSTIMESTAMP < REQST_END_DT THEN 'P' WHEN SYSTIMESTAMP > REQST_END_DT THEN 'F' END AS PROGRS_STTUS , RCRIT_COMPT_AT , REQST_MTHD , FN_CMMNCODE_NM('COM053', REQST_MTHD) AS REQST_MTHD_NM , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , PSNCPA , TOT_CNT01 , TOT_CNT02 , WAIT_REQST_AT , WAIT_REQST_NMPR , CASE WHEN PRG_CL = '10' THEN '500022' WHEN PRG_CL = '11' THEN '500023' WHEN PRG_CL = '12' THEN '500024' WHEN PRG_CL = '13' THEN '500025' WHEN PRG_CL = '20' THEN '500048' WHEN PRG_CL = '21' THEN '500049' WHEN PRG_CL = '30' THEN '200025' WHEN PRG_CL = '31' THEN '200026' WHEN PRG_CL = '40' THEN '200029' WHEN PRG_CL = '41' THEN '200030' WHEN PRG_CL = '42' THEN '200031' END AS MENU_NO , SITE_SE FROM TN_PROGRAM T LEFT OUTER JOIN ( /*대기신청 인원*/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT01, PRG_SN FROM TN_REQUEST_INDVDLINFO WHERE DELETE_AT = '0' AND RCEPT_STTUS = '01' GROUP BY PRG_SN )T1 ON T.PRG_SN = T1.PRG_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN ( /*신청완료 인원*/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT02, PRG_SN FROM TN_REQUEST_INDVDLINFO WHERE DELETE_AT = '0' AND RCEPT_STTUS = '02' GROUP BY PRG_SN)T2 ON T.PRG_SN = T2.PRG_SN WHERE DELETE_AT = '0' AND USE_AT = 'Y' ) A WHERE A.PRG_NM LIKE '%' || #q# || '%'
